Question: 先日
Comment: the other day; a few days ago

Question: 傷つく
Comment: to be wounded; to get injured; to get hurt feelings

Question: 代わる
Comment: to succeed; to relieve; to replace

Question: 渡る
Comment: to cross over; to go across; to extend

Question: 代わりに
Comment: instead of; in place of; as a substitute for

Question: 恐れる
Comment: to fear; to be afraid of

Question: １日
Answers: いちにち,いちじつ,ついたち
Comment: all day (long); the whole day; from morning till night

Question: 味わう
Comment: to taste; to savor; to savour

Question: 見守る
Comment: to watch over; to keep watch over; to keep an eye on

Question: 甘える
Comment: to behave like a spoiled child; to fawn on; to take advantage of

Question: 来てる
Comment: to have come; to be here; to be popular

Question: その間
Comment: in the meanwhile; during the time

Question: 広げる
Comment: to spread; to extend; to expand

Question: 受け止める
Comment: to catch; to stop the blow; to react to

Question: 直前
Comment: just before; just prior to; right in front of

Question: 売れる
Comment: to sell (well); to be well known; to be popular

Question: 足音
Comment: sense or sign that something is approaching

Question: 申し上げる
Comment: to say; to tell; to state

Question: 両手
Answers: りょうて,もろて,もろで

Question: 巻く
Comment: to wind; to coil; to roll

Question: 見捨てる
Comment: to abandon; to fail; to desert

Question: 見張る
Comment: to stand watch; to stand guard; to look out

Question: 任す
Comment: to entrust (to someone); to leave (in someone's hands)

Question: 我
Answers: われ,わ,あれ,あ,わぬ,わろ,わが,が

Question: 落ち着ける
Comment: to quiet; to calm down; to compose oneself

Question: 生み出す
Comment: to create; to bring forth; to produce

Question: 失礼しました
Comment: my apologies; I'm sorry; excuse me

Question: 痛む
Comment: to hurt; to ache; to feel a pain

Question: 生む
Comment: to give birth; to bear (child); to lay (eggs)

Question: 見送る
Comment: to see (someone) off; to escort; to watch (someone or something) go out of sight

Question: 飲み込む
Comment: to swallow; to gulp down; to understand

Question: 両
Answers: りょう,もろ,モロ,りゃん,リャン,テール
Comment: both (hands, parents, sides, etc.); counter for carriages (e.g. in a train); counter for vehicles
